ascend_skill.desc:
After an ally uses a skill, Futaba gains 5% to her Analysis Progress. Also when an ally deals weakness damage with a skill, Resonance or Highlight, Futaba gains 20% more to her Analysis Progress.
When Data Storm is active, increase the party's damage by 10%/15%/20% based on Futaba's level (effect changes at Lv. 1/50/70, respectively); if dealing weakness damage, double this damage increase.
ascend_skill.name: Data Scan

ascend_skill.desc: When Futaba's Analysis Progress reaches 100% or when Data Storm is active, increase allies' critical rate by 12%.
ascend_skill.name: Payload Optimization

ascend_skill.desc:
When an ally attacks a foe that has been debuffed by Futaba, increase Attack by 25%.
Also, if any ally takes damage that would KO them, survive the attack with 1 HP and grant a shield to all allies for 3 turns equal to 20% of Futaba's Attack. This effect activates once per battle.
ascend_skill.name: Storage Redundancy

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Data Link Established! and Vulnerability Found! by 3.
ascend_skill.name: Elegant Code

ascend_skill.desc:
When an ally uses a Highlight, Futaba gains 1 Security Flaw stack. Stacks up to 2 times.
When Futaba uses Pentest Complete! or Vulnerability Found!, spend all Security Flaw stacks to increase the effect by 8% for each stack.
ascend_skill.name: Zero-Day Exploit

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill level of Pentest Complete! by 3.
ascend_skill.name: Master Codebreaker

ascend_skill.desc:
When Futaba uses Data Link Established!, target all allies, and also inflict Virus on all foes corresponding to an ally's attribute (Viruses of the same attribute do not stack).
Increase the duration of Data Storm to 3 turns, and increase allies' weakness damage by 10%, and damage dealt by 25%.
ascend_skill.name: Wizard-Level Hacker

normal_skill.desc:
For 3 turns, decrease all foes' Defense by 6%; decrease Defense by 0.53% more for every 100 points of Futaba's Attack (up to 4600/5060/5980/6440 of Attack). When foes with this Defense decrease take weakness damage, multiply the effect by 2.
If Futaba's Analysis Progress is at 100%, also grant Data Storm to all allies for 2 turns.
normal_skill.name: Pentest Complete!

normal_skill.desc:
For 3 turns, increase 1 foe's damage taken by 6%; increase damage taken by 0.57% more for every 100 points of Futaba's Attack (up to 4600/5060/5980/6440 of Attack).
When an ally deals damage with a skill, Resonance, or Highlight to foes inflicted with this effect, gain 20% Analysis Progress.
If Futaba's Analysis Progress is at 100%, also grant Data Storm to all allies for 2 turns.
normal_skill.name: Vulnerability Found!

normal_skill.desc:
Usable when allies have Data Storm. For 2 turns, increase 1 ally's Attack by 270/297/302/329; increase Attack by 21.7 more for every 100 points of Futaba's Attack (up to 4600/5060/5980/6440 of Attack).
Inflict Virus on all foes for 1 turn, based on the targeted ally's attribute.
Virus: Change affinities of the foe this is inflicted upon. (Null, Repel, and Drain become Resist. Resist becomes Normal. Normal becomes Weak. Weak attributes take 25% more weakness damage.)
normal_skill.name: Data Link Established!

passive_skill.desc: At the start of battle, Futaba gains 100% to her Analysis Progress.
passive_skill.name: Programming Pro

passive_skill.desc: When Data Storm is active, grant all allies a shield equal to 30.0% of Futaba's Attack for 3 turns.
passive_skill.name: Rootkit
